question.title: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "Why do people think blacks are still being mistreated? In my experience they can do as they please and people get out of their way very quickly.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}

answer.content: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "Hello, Mr. or Ms. Anonymous, I'm so surprised you asked this question anonymously. This was a triumph of insightful, incisive interrogation. I'm being so sincere right now.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "In the US, Black people are far more likely to receive prison sentences for crimes than white people convicted of the same crimes under similar circumstances.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Black people are less likely to be hired than equally qualified white people. Several studies have demonstrated this by taking ", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": "word for word identical ", "modifiers": {"italic": true}}, {"text": "resumes, attaching a \u201cblack sounding\u201d or \u201cwhite sounding\u201d name, and sending them to employers. Resumes with white-sounding names receive far more callbacks than identical resumes with black-sounding names.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Same for apartment applications. Same for mortgage applications.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Black people are far more likely to be shot by police for non-violent infractions. Police who shoot unarmed Black people are far less likely to face any consequences than police who shoot unarmed whites.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "If you look at the objective evidence, the points of data make a beautiful line squarely in the direction of systemic racism, though of course, it isn't racism that is of interest to those who ask questions such as this.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}
